column9: It didn't feel that it was fresh food and the made it that day. We skipped one of the dishes and tried to pick eatable parts which was not smelling old.
Reasonably good food at a good price, could do with having an English menu however the pictures on the menu were really helpful.

I have eaten Thai food all over the world including Thailand. Amazing Thai has the best Thai food in Lund. If you order online you get big portions and also they deliver directly to the apartment door.

I've been here a couple times and the service is always below par. The people working in the front of the house don't seem to care that you are there and help you at there convince. The food is good but never ready on time....More

column7: Thaifood at its best , aroy aroy
column9:
Nice food for a Big brother ! Like every other thai place theres a great dilemma . If you eat ala carte youll never be satified ... Too little food and if you eat buffé it makes you too heavy !
But taste is awesome...More

We went for having lunch here on the recommendation of a friend and I was not very thrilled by what I ate.
The place itself is nothing fancy, quite small and not incredibly cleaned. But I could live with that if the food would have...More

column7: Sämsta servicen jag varit med om, gå aldrig dit
